name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Senior Frontend Engineer
professional_summary: Built a client portal using React.js, integrating RESTful APIs for data management, which improved user engagement.
Developed reusable components and front-end libraries, reducing development time for future projects.
Optimized React components for performance and scalability, ensuring smooth user experiences.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and deliver new features, aligning with business goals.
Ensured code quality through unit testing and linting, maintaining high standards across projects.
Participated in code reviews and continuous integration processes, enhancing team productivity.
Utilized JavaScript (ES6+) and React.js to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces.
Implemented state management using Redux and Context API, improving application state handling.
Integrated GraphQL endpoints for efficient data fetching, enhancing application performance.
Worked with frontend build tools like Webpack and Babel to streamline development workflows.
Managed version control using Git/GitHub, ensuring seamless collaboration and code tracking.
Developed responsive designs using HTML5, CSS3, and Tailwind CSS, enhancing user experience.
Implemented asynchronous programming techniques to handle REST APIs efficiently.
Contributed to CI/CD pipelines, automating testing and deployment processes.
Used Jest and React Testing Library for unit testing, ensuring robust code quality.
Collaborated with backend teams using Node.js and Express for seamless API integration.
Explored Next.js for server-side rendering, improving SEO and performance.
Mentored junior developers in React.js and frontend best practices, fostering team growth.
